resources.string: Enable notification to launch the storage when an USB storage is pluged.
By checking this the application will open your phone Storage Info when an USB storage is pluged. Otherwise will be open this settings window.
Use this to show or hide the notification shortcut to the Storage settings.
By checking this you will enable debugging support. You will see some toast messages on the screen with device events. In format: Storage Info: android.intent…
Only if you want to appreciate my work.
If you appreciate this application, please do a donation!\nPressing YES button, you will be sent using your default browser to a PayPal donnation page.\nThank you for using this application!

string.name: about_text
string.Data:
Because my phone have support for USB-OTG (USB On-The-Go), but do not have a quick way to unmount an attached USB device, I made this application.
This is an open source application. The sources are available here: https://code.google.com/p/storage-info/

This application will create a shortcut for the Storage Settings on the Notification bar when an USB mass storage is connected to an Android device which support USB-OTG.
Normaly the Storage Settings should be accessbile from your Settings menu.

This application will not add to your device host support, read device manual to see if the device support USB-OTG. In some cases the USB-OTG could be enabled by using a custom ROM.

This application will not mount or unmount an USB storage device, that\'s Storage Settings for.
